CustomField.description: Date that you are putting a case on hold due to a future payroll run date. This should coincide with the date you are updating the status to “On Hold – Future Payroll Run Date”
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date that you are putting a case on hold due to a future payroll run date. This should coincide with the date you are updating the status to “On Hold – Future Payroll Run Date”
CustomField.label: Start Date of On Hold-Future PR Run Date
